Sign Out: The password doesn't match this account. Verify the password and try again.
Sair: A senha não corresponde a essa conta. Verifique a senha e tente novamente.

Sair: The email address is incorrect. Verify the email address and try again.

Sair: A senha precisa de pelo menos %1 caracteres. Crie uma nova senha e tente novamente.

Sair: The password can't begin or end with a space. Verify the password and try again.

Sair: The password can't be the same as the email address. Create a new password and try again.
